thread.title: Jacek

author: Jacek
title: Jacek
text: Being a part of the TrustedHousesitters community is a big pleasure and also a huge privilege. Being responsible for someoneâ€™s property and most importantly beloved pets is not only an unforgettable experience, it is also a chance to see yourself in a different environment. It is a perfect way for those who are passionate about animals and travel to combine those two. You get to meet some amazing people who put their trust in you and, in a way, invited you not only to look after their property and pet, but to become a part of their family for a while, which is priceless!
